original_text: and said to all the congregation of the people of Israel, “The land, which we passed through to spy it out, is an exceedingly good land.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중에게 말하여 이르되 우리가 두루 다니며 정탐한 땅은 심히 아름다운 땅이라

sentences.original_text: and said to all the congregation of the people of Israel,
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중에게 말하여 가로되,

sentences.original_text: The land, which we passed through to spy it out,
